TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataConnectionStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the , and members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Telephony.DataConnectionStatus Connected = int32(2)

summary.para: Data connection state: Connected. IP traffic should be available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Telephony.DataConnectionStatus Connecting = int32(1)

summary.para: Data connection state: Currently setting up a data connection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Telephony.DataConnectionStatus Disconnected = int32(0)

summary.para: Data connection state: Disconnected. IP traffic not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Telephony.DataConnectionStatus Suspended = int32(3)

summary.para: Data connection state: Suspended. The connection is up, but IP traffic is temporarily unavailable. For example, in a 2G network, data activity may be suspended when a voice call arrives.
